name: Presently Presenting Presentable Presents
description:
You are an elf in santa's workshop, and are tasked with fulfilling children's present orders. Careful though, Santa is making sure you look presentable while you present your presents!

Controls:

Player 1: wasd to move, spacebar to interact

Player 2: arrow keys to move, / to interact.

Created by:
